markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Limited">
[Impart Empathy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1094)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 80

**Traditions**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1  animal 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
Will

**Duration** 1 day
</row>

</column>

---

You expand the target's ability to understand social cues that are normally beyond its comprehension. Any creature to which the target isn't [unfriendly](/Conditions.aspx?ID=40) or [hostile](/Conditions.aspx?ID=23) can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on it and to make very simple [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of it. This doesn't render the animal any more inclined to help than it otherwise would be.

---
**Heightened (4th)** The spell can also target [plants](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) and [fungi](/Traits.aspx?ID=77).
name: Impart Empathy

summary: You expand the target's ability to understand social cues that are normally beyond its comprehension.
summary_markdown: You expand the target's ability to understand social cues that are normally beyond its comprehension.
text: Impart Empathy Two Actions May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame Source Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon pg. 80 Traditions Occult, Primal Cast somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 animal Saving Throw Will Duration 1 day --- You expand the target's ability to understand social cues that are normally beyond its comprehension. Any creature to which the target isn't unfriendly or hostile can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on it and to make very simple Requests of it. This doesn't render the animal any more inclined to help than it otherwise would be. --- Heightened (4th) The spell can also target plants and fungi.
